description.en:
Packages for players and authors of interactive
    fiction
DeaDBeeF player overlay for Funtoo Linux
Various gentoo ebuilds tweaked mainly around multimedia, python and forensics.

Experimental overlay for desktop effects
    packages.

Support for the Enlightenment project, most notably
    DR17/e17.

Packages to support Nokia Internet Tablets
    (N8x0)

The experimental gentoo overlay was designed as a way to keep
    up-to-date. Most of it are live ebuilds, ebuilds that pull the latest HEAD
    from whatever repository. It also includes ebuilds for clients that are not
    yet in portage. It is maintained by avuton, send new ebuilds, corrections
    or bugs directly to him.

description.de: Verschiedene ebuilds aus verschiedenen Quellen: selbsterstellte ebuilds, ebuilds mit geringfügigen Änderungen, gegenüber dem aktuellen Baum, ebuilds aus Gentoos Bugzilla, ebuilds mit erweiterten patches, alte ebuilds die nicht mehr im offiziellen Baum existieren, etc.
description.en: Mixed ebuilds from various sources: self-written missing ebuilds, more current ebuilds, ebuilds that just needed a slight update from official portage, ebuilds others posted on Gentoo Bugzilla, ebuilds with added patches, old ebuilds that were removed from official portage etc.
Dennis Lan's testing grounds and bleeding edge ebuilds
Latest tarballs from the CenterIM Mob-branch and a live ebuild.

Common Lisp/Scheme development, recruitment and live overlay.
    Support and feedback in `#gentoo-lisp' and via
    `gentoo-lisp@lists.gentoo.org'.
Experimental ebuilds for Gentoo specific guis and guis related projects
Ebuilds for experimental packages and chinese patches
Ebuilds for the Robot Operating System (ROS).

Helpful ebuilds for the macbook pro, and experimental
    gentoo-science packages.
Development Overlay for Hardened Gcc 4.x Toolchain
Gambas IDE overlay for Funtoo Linux
Some new packages plus uncommitted patches and ebuilds for the main tree
Overlay to store java-related ebuilds, for further reviewing
Development tools for embedded systems and misc stuff
This repository contains the ebuild used to build spike, a pentesting distro based on Sabayon.
New mozilla development that is not yet in tree

Russian overlay with a some patched and specific
    software

The Gentoo Science Overlay is intended as a place to work
    outside of the main portage tree on experimental ebuilds. Our aim is to
    increase the rate of development of scientific packages for Gentoo, but
    ebuilds in this repository are by their very nature more experimental. If
    you wish to use them you should be willing to help test and report
    bugs. For contribution read http://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/Project:Science/Contributing

Ebuilds for packages not in the Gentoo tree
        (lack of maintainer or too experimental) and live ebuilds
        or extensions/bugfixes for packages in the tree
A collection of ebuilds from Wolfram Schlich
Bleeding edge, experimental overlay for Gentoo
Some useful ebuilds. Includes 1C-Predpriyatie and postgres with patches for work with 1C.
Packages for the Squeezebox network audio player from Logitech
Jorge Manuel B. S. Vicetto developer overlay

Experimental ebuilds for Perl packages in Gentoo. Comments and
    bugreports are welcome!
The playground of gekis hacking on Gentoo Linux distribution.

Evermind's overlay with ebuilds for a lot of pro-audio
    production software.
Bits and pieces missing in gentoo or layman repos I need

This overlay contains some experimental stuff, but mostly
    stuff I quickly wrote an ebuild for or grabed it from bugzilla and did not
    have the time to commit it to the official tree or do not consider it ready
    for it.
Various development tools, libraries, and patches not in Gentoo (yet)
Bring Android back home to Linux.

Sabayon related ebuilds such as artwork, kernel binaries,
    split packages, etc.
    Bugs to http://bugs.sabayon.org
User collaboration on ebuilds for the systemd init system
Split ebuilds for the Sage computer algebra system
Fixed ebuilds for uclibc and other embedded systems

This overlay contains some experimental stuff, such as
    turboprint printers driver (bug #61311), intel-536ep driver for lastest 2.6
    kernels (bug #127464), lastest grisbi version (proxy maintainer) before
    it's portage integration and so on.
Patches and patched ebuilds; xen and python bugs && bumps
Packages mostly related to graphics and multimedia
Development overlay for VDR, testing branch.
Ebuilds for bugs assigned to maintainer-wanted

Sabayon MATE (GNOME fork) ebuilds that could be
    upstreamed at some point in future (when GNOME2 will be dropped
    from the main tree).
    Bugs to http://bugs.sabayon.org

The goal for this overlay is to reproduce the Open Enterprise
    server from novell on gentoo

Developer overlay of Hans de Graaff with mostly ruby and
    xemacs ebuilds, and a few assorted other goodies.
The Chamber of a Rebel – Servers, Tools and Widgets.

wired's testing grounds and bleeding edge
    ebuilds
An overlay filled with lots of goodies for those who are hooked on WINE.
A gentoo portage overlay with a set of too exotic, or unusal ebuilds for the sunrise overlay or the main tree.
Well-documented ebuilds en-route to a bandersnatch near you
Bitcoin and CPU/GPU mining related ebuilds
Joint beta-quality overlay effort to reduce overlay scatter. Any dev is welcome to join.
Ebuilds not good enough to make it to Sabayon's for-gentoo.

To provide programs useful to Chinese speaking users (merged
      from gentoo-china and gentoo-taiwan).
Collection of ebuilds to install Sublime Text 2 or Sublime Text 3
Overlay dedicated to Grub2 themes (of any distribution)
dev-python/netzob and maybe some i3 hacks
Third-party gentoo overlay from Agent Smith.
Unofficial Gentoo overlay for the Pale Moon (http://www.palemoon.org/) web browser.
Some roguelikes, perl modules, themes, multimedia and other utilities
Collection of ebuilds with experimental features
Personal overlay of fkmclane containing patched ebuilds and new ebuilds
Gentoo overlay for Valve's Steam client and Steam-based games

Repository for development of (mostly bleeding-edge)
    multimedia packages for Gentoo Linux. This is the official overlay
    for Gentoo's media herds.
Packages to support Nokia Internet Tablets (N900)
TF201 (Asus Transformer Prime) overlay for Gentoo
This is roslin, my small overlay. Enjoy! (:
Ebuilds that end up in Funtoo ports-2012

Official testing overlay for Qt and related packages, provided
    by Gentoo's Qt team. Contains ebuilds for Qt4 and Qt5 prereleases and live ebuilds,
    plus various (non-KDE) applications and utilities that use Qt.
All ebuilds made by Daniel Shafer
Some random work in progress stuff from alexxy
This personal repository contains ebuilds and fixes for packages that I'm interested in
Gentoo Layman portage repository for Jetbrains Products
Ebuilds related to nginx webserver modules
An overlay for gentoo for things Flammie's worked on: Apertium, HFST, computational linguistics, spell-checking, obscure languages...
nightmare is a gentoo overlay with some stuff
Viprea; a distribution based on Gentoo
A few packages that are not hosted elsewhere.
Desktop oriented overlay for various ebuilds and the occasional gamer
Progress Overlay: Python packages (including Pyramid, Zope) and other packages

Overlay for VDR, that contains ebuilds for development version
    of VDR, and specific plugins for that version.
misc ebuilds that aren't in the main tree
Experimental ebuilds that are still unmaintained
Overlay to install the Unity desktop
Packages related to the bumblebee project
Overlay for packages tree-cleaned from the official portage repository
Gamers overlay for all various games. Not related with games team.
Experimental ebuilds from the Ruby edge.
Ebuilds of Hacking Network Solutions Ltd
Gentoo overlay for Toxcore, Tox clients, and Tox related projects
DuPol's own and modified portage ebuilds.
Portage overlay to maintain seafile ebuilds

Sabayon ebuilds that could be upstreamed to
    Gentoo (or just being useful for Gentoo users as well):
    hot fixes, ebuild updates, etc.
    For Sabayon-only ebuilds, please use the sabayon-distro overlay.
    Bugs to http://bugs.sabayon.org
Unofficial mirror of overlay "perl-experimental" with metadata cache
The overlay contains new or updated security tools.
Humble Indie Bundle unofficial overlay for Gentoo
Miscelleneous ebuild fixes and personal ebuilds
Deep Space Window Manager - StumpWM-based windowmanager with better usability

Experimental ebuilds for the Xfce4 Desktop
    Environment
sattvik's overlay with personalized bug fixes and tweaks
Gentoo overlay with ebuilds by Stefan Talpalaru that are not in the tree
Dilfridge overlay: experimental ebuilds and lab software
Various ebuilds made and used by Greek Gentoo Community (gentoo-el)

A collection of ebuilds related to the D programming
    language.
Gentoo overlay with some patched packages.
Random stuff I am working on which isn't ready for the tree for some reason
Overlay of Gentoo developer Sebastian Pipping; for issues, please open tickets at GitHub
Unofficial ebuilds for gentoo based distributions.
Soft's personal overlay for miscellaneous ebuilds
Overlay for apps related to secure communication, cryptography and anonymity
Software needed to render the Blender-based gentoo Logo of 2003
Quarks's overlay; needful things around Gentoo Hardened, Security and Penetration Testing
Unofficial repository with all vapoursynth related ebuilds

A collection of Bazaar-related ebuilds, including release
    candidates of Bazaar.

Toolchain ebuilds that are unsuitable for the tree. Snapshots,
    unstable versions, etc...
Ikelos's hospice for broken and damaged ebuilds.
Gentoo overlay for ebuilds related to 'hand-made' Active Home construction
Ebuilds related to the ownCloud Sync Client
gentoo overlay containing games ebuilds only
Gentoo ebuilds for "bleeding edge" versions of packages - newest, untested - running on ~amd64.
Gentoo cross-compilation overlay for embedded devices
The elementary OS experience for Gentoo Linux.

The goal for this overlay is to reproduce the Open Enterprise
    server from novell on gentoo
Ebuilds for webserver, osm and other software.

Provide Emacs and XEmacs related ebuilds which are
    experimental or work-in-progress. Don't rely on them, but don't
    hesitate to file bugs or write emails.
Overlay with focus on VDR and software that is not in Portage
Ebuild testing playground of Emery Hemingway
Public Gentoo overlay for games, emulators and more of nifty stuff
Auto-generated repository which moves apps to /usr
Ported Open WebOS components and libraries
Overlay for the NX/FreeNX packages for Gentoo.
Ebuilds made and modified by klondike, mainly sound and virtualization
Cool, new, useful, and unmaintained packages
A collection of ebuilds that are missing or outdated or incomplete on the Gentoo portage official repository..
miscellanious fixes, modifications, and newer versions of ebuilds
Put more love between systemd, users and openrc
James Broadhead's personal overlay and pre-sunrise testing ground
Experimental ebuilds for GNUstep packages in Gentoo. Comments and bugreports are welcome!
